name: Does It Shoot? (LudumDare32)
description:
This is a game about gunsmith, who should craft weapons for soldiers from junk he has and hope it to work. 
By combining different parts you can achieve some cool (or not really) effects, which can allow soldier to go further and find a new parts. 
The game is raw, still playable. 

Four Quarters team:

  • Dmitry "deceiver" Karimov - artist 
  • Alexander "blinch" Goryeslavets - music, sounds 
  • Alexander "finlal" Vartazaryan - artist 
  • Dmitry "theRandom" Lagutov - programmer
